text: Pakati pa Maarabu ena a m’chipululu pali amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi tsiku lomaliza, ndipo amaona zopereka zawo m’njira ya Mulungu ngati zinthu zowabweretsa kufupi ndi Mulungu ndi mapemphero a Mtumwi. Ndithudi zimenezo zidzawabweretsa kufupi. Ndipo Mulungu adzawalowetsa iwo ku chisomo chake. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wokhululukira ndi wachisoni chosatha
